passed_checks.check_name: Minimize the admission of containers with capabilities assigned
code_block:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kustomizegoat
  name: kustomizegoat
  namespace: kustomizegoat-prod
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kustomizegoat
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        seccomp.security.alpha.kubernetes.io/pod: docker/default
      labels:
        app: kustomizegoat
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - kustomizegoat
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      automountServiceAccountToken: false
      containers:
      - image: eurogig/kustomizegoat@sha256:f152b255ec14aa06ed59fbccae66d9d90f751633b5c2c094b7c810ad53314723
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - '[ -f /var/run/nginx.pid ] && ps -A | grep nginx'
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: kustomizegoat
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /index.html
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.6"
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
            - NET_RAW
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/cache/nginx
          name: cache-volume
        - mountPath: /var/run
          name: pid-volume
      securityContext:
        runAsGroup: 10014
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 10014
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: cache-volume
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: pid-volume

      - image: eurogig/kustomizegoat@sha256:f152b255ec14aa06ed59fbccae66d9d90f751633b5c2c094b7c810ad53314723
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - '[ -f /var/run/nginx.pid ] && ps -A | grep nginx'
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: kustomizegoat
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /index.html
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.6"
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
            - NET_RAW
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/cache/nginx
          name: cache-volume
        - mountPath: /var/run
          name: pid-volume
      securityContext:
        runAsGroup: 10014
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 10014
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: cache-volume
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: pid-volume

failed_checks.check_name: Minimize the admission of pods which lack an associated NetworkPolicy
code_block:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kustomizegoat
  name: kustomizegoat
  namespace: kustomizegoat-prod
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kustomizegoat
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        seccomp.security.alpha.kubernetes.io/pod: docker/default
      labels:
        app: kustomizegoat
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - kustomizegoat
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      automountServiceAccountToken: false
      containers:
      - image: eurogig/kustomizegoat@sha256:f152b255ec14aa06ed59fbccae66d9d90f751633b5c2c094b7c810ad53314723
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - '[ -f /var/run/nginx.pid ] && ps -A | grep nginx'
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: kustomizegoat
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /index.html
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.6"
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
            - NET_RAW
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/cache/nginx
          name: cache-volume
        - mountPath: /var/run
          name: pid-volume
      securityContext:
        runAsGroup: 10014
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 10014
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: cache-volume
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: pid-volume
